body_html:
@boegel If it brings any comfort, building Tensorflow with Bazel on Windows is even more painful. Regularly breaks, then few external contributors or someone from Bazel team will come to fix the build. Repeat cycle.

Someone made it possible to build Tensorflow with CMake + Ninja (see #16763)!

Someone made it possible to build Tensorflow with CMake + Ninja (see #16763)!
body:
@boegel If it brings any comfort, building Tensorflow with Bazel on Windows is even more painful. Regularly breaks, then few external contributors or someone from Bazel team will come to fix the build. Repeat cycle.

Someone made it possible to build Tensorflow with CMake + Ninja (see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/16763)!
